Document: ## Mothic Recipes -Below is a list of some of the foods Moths can eat: -Mothic Salad = Microwave 1 Cabbage + 1 Red Onion slice + 1 Tomato for 10 seconds -Fleet Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Mothic Salad + 1 Carrot + 1 Bread Slice + 1 Cheese Wedge + 5u Vinaigrette for 10 seconds -Cotton Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Mothic Salad + 1 Cotton + 1 Carrot + 5u Vinaigrette for 10 seconds -Kachumbari Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Mothic Salad + 1 Chili + 1 Red Onion + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 5u Lime Juice for 10 seconds -Melon Fruit bowl = Microwave 1 Watermelon + 1 Apple + 1 Banana + 1 Lemon + 1 Orange + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris for 5 seconds -Caprese Salad = Microwave 1 Tomato + 1 Mozzarella + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 5u Vinaigrette for 10 seconds -Valid Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 1 Potato + 1 Meatball for 5 seconds -Fruit Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Orange + 1 Apple + 1 Grape + 2 Watermelon Slices for 5 seconds -Citrus Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Orange + 1 Lemon + 1 Lime for 5 seconds -Jungle Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Banana +1 Apple + 1 Grape +2 Watermelon Slices for 5 seconds -Herb Salad = Microwave 1 Bowl + 3 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 1 apple for 5 seconds -Vegetarian Chili = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Tomato +1 Chili + 10u water + 5u table salt for 10 seconds -Bungo Curry = Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Bungo Fruit + 1 Chili + 5u water for 10 seconds -Heartburn Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Tofu Slice + 1 Chili + 5u Vinegar + 5u Milk + 5u Cream for 10 seconds -Cheese Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Potato + 5u Milk + 5u Flour + 5u Cream for10 seconds -Seed Soup = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Ambrosia Vulgaris + 1 Poppy Seeds + 1 wheat Seeds + 5u water + 5u Vinaigrette for 10 seconds -Tomato Soup= Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Tomato + 10u water for 10 seconds -Stew = Microwave 1 Bowl + 3 Raw Cutlets + 1 Tomato + 1 Potato + 1 Carrot + 1 Eggplant + 1 Chantrelle Cluster + 10u water for 10 seconds -Oat Stew = Microwave 1 Bowl + 2 Carrots + 1 Potato + 5u water + 5u Oats for 10 seconds -Bean Stew = Microwave 1 Bowl + 1 Tin of Beans + 1 Cabbage + 1 Tomato +1 Onion + 1 Baked Corn + 5u water for 10 seconds -Fried Eggplant and Polenta = Microwave 1 Cheesey Porridge + 1 Eggplant + 2 Bread Slices + 1 Mozzarella + 5u tomato sauce for 10 seconds -Cornmeal Porridge = Microwave 1 Bowl + 10u Cornmeal + 10u water for 10 seconds -Cheesey Porridge = Microwave 1 Cornmeal Porridge + 1 Curd Cheese + 1 Cheese Wedge + 5u milk + 5u cream for 10 seconds -Firecracker Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Baked Corn + 1 Chili + 10 BBQ Sauce for 30 seconds -Quattro Formaggi Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 1 Mozzarella + 1 Cheese Wedge + 1 Curd Cheese + 1 Cheese Curds + 10u Tomato Sauce for 30 seconds -Pesto Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 2 Tomatos + 2 Mozzarella + 10u Pesto Sauce for 30 seconds -Cotton Pizza = Microwave 1 Flat Dough + 1 Mozzarella + 1 Curd Cheese + 1 Cotton + 5u Corn Oil for 30 seconds
